WRITING.TEXT: I've just encountered the same problem.. But I ran it earlier today ?!?!
I've recently started QiGong, which involves meditation in the movement . I also do very gentle yoga. I have M.E so I can't do too much as it will make me crash badly with fatigue.

I used to cut the tops of my arms as I'm always wearing band shirts no-one ever noticed. Now I have tattoos covering the scars, recently I did my lower arms, it's winter so I've just worn long sleeves or hoodies. Most recent was on my legs - hide with socks, But I went abit mad and have a lot more than normal to now try and hide. x\_x i'm now 32, I've hidden mine for years. no-one knows apart from the therapist I recently started seeing.
doesn't your teeth/jaw hurt? I can't go more than 2 days without brushing mine. It feels like a chore (especially with fatigue) but feels better :)

So true, but I think people just don't understand. I told my best mate last week I am really struggling, I just need some support and she literally said she didn't know what to say and changed the subject. Like she was embarrassed.

Wow, you just described me, I didn't realise there was a word for feeling being in that kind of state. I don't have the motivation either, I've packed in nearly all of my hobbies, I don't want to go out anywhere or see/talk to anyone (except my therapist) I just want the thoughts and feelings of numbness and harming to stop.

I am feeling exactly the same. Only 1 of my friends know I harm and was so disappointed, a couple of other friends think i'm just having a 'low patch' apart from that it's just me and my psychologist. I know my family and close friends would be devastated, but I don't want to live like this anymore. Had it far to long and I believe it's contributed to my physical problems now. I have no motivation to do anything, everything feels like a chore. And I feel numb and have my brain screaming at me to harm. Sick of it all.

I do. Not on meds for either as I am on so many for other things, I dont want anymore. They just add more side effects. I use fidget tools like a tangle, spinner and cube. You can get them on amazon. I also do Yoga and QiGong to help calm me and stop me thinking about things. I'm also seeing a psychologist, who has been helping.
Not yet, I am exactly the same but my psychologist is referring me.

I've deflected her questions each time she asked, but next session we'll be talking about it. I suffered abuse so. I'm really anxious though, as I only reached out to these as I went on a 10 weeks pain course and built up trust. If I don't trust someone I won't talk. :(
feeling exactly the same :(

Feeling the same. I was starting to make progress with my physcologist. Then someone close to my family died, mum may have cancer back (scan on sat) and now all this with the virus. Feels like the world is out to get me.
Your doing better than me then. I've managed to kill 2 sims so far. One drowned after I left her to her own devices and the other I tried to get put out a fire and died #128529;
So are you

UK here, i've played some games i'm not sure if they are 'serious games' first time I have heard that term. City builders, fitness, brain training games, logic puzzles etc. I have completed the survey. I'm now looking into Sparx. .. Oh it's only available in New Zealand. Well I will keep an eye on that, it sounded good.

Ok, I am Titan, but I'd assume it will be the same for all classes. Select the required subclass. Have your melee box charged (middle box under supercharge bar) and punch when it is fully charged. That should give you 1 kill. You have to wait till it is fully charged again for it count for another kill. Hope that makes sense.
I've just looked up pictures of Sparx, not what I was expecting, but very much what I like to play. So will definetly email them expressing my interest :D

Hey, what server are you on? I've played FF14 for like 6 years, always something new to do. FFXIV is great because even if you don't want to play/pay, then you can stop then start off again from where you stopped.

I hope I can offer some help here.I feel the same. I see (currently phone appointments) a psychologist every 2 weeks. I've said from day one I am so bored, nothing interests me anymore. 2 psychologists have told me that not boredom but low mood. I have M.E and Fibro so often feel like drugs/speed might help.. But ultimately I know it won't you'll just get addicted. Believe me, I know. I go through phases at the moment. I've got so much going on at home/work that currently has my full attention. On my days off I am abit stuck. I have always been a big gamer. Final Fantasy 14 (like someone else suggested is great, I also play Destiny 2, and have just bought a VR. Find a game like FF14 that has a lot to do, you can fight, gather, craft. (19 fight classes and 12 gather/crafters to level 80) It also has on going patches and expansions. I try to get into a good book series (currently Skullduggery Pleasant) I used to play intruments but now have no interest in that, so just listen to spotify or collect vinyls (usually metal) I watch ALOT of tv/films, Disney+, Netflix, Amazon Prime, YouTube. And finally try a new hobby, I've always been interested in aviation/history so I started making scale models (airfix, revell, Tamiya etc) however I've also lost interest in it atm . :/ I also come on to here when I feel rubbish, posting makes me feel abit better.

I've attempted twice many years ago, through pills. Recently I've had thoughts again, but what pulled me out of it was the thought of my stepdad, who would care for him, he would have to go into a care home and he wouldn't last long there. I felt like I would have killed him myself if I took my own life. I'm glad you survived it, and you found a purpose in your family.
ah nice, I'm on Lich :)
Art?! And I thought my head was F'd up.

WRITING.TITLE: Illness taken everything from me.
WRITING.TEXT: Does anyone else feel like they're life is all for nothing? I'm 32 years old. And I feel like my life is pointless. Been thinking the last few days, when I was in school I wanted to play Football, and play in rock bands. I did play in local bands, football never happened. Then around 20 years old I started to get sick. I now have Scoliosis, Myalgic Encephalomyelitis ,Fibromyalgia, Depresssion , and countless side effects to all the medications i'm on. I work part time caring for my stepdad who has an acquired brain injury. But beyond that, I am nothing. I have no life thanks to chronic illness, friends don't understand or don't care, my mother who is my world has just been diagnosed with extensive bone cancer (secondary) Beyond my mum and my stepdad, I have no-one. I keep thinking I don't want to be here when they go, I might just join them, because what is the point in living like this? It's not living, It's only existing.
I feel like this at the moment, though I've kind of made it like that so I don't have to deal with what's going on in my life at the moment. But it is a strange feeling.

I have been wondering this. On one hand he probably did exist and died during the freeze. Or Melanie being an engineer (I think I heard correctly) is the brains behind the train and Mr Wilford is like a made up person. I'm not really sure, but I am enjoying the show alot.
Oh I am so happy to hear that, love Till :)
I assumed the third class were the workers, so they work to get on the train , but haven't actually paid a ticket. Maybe I am wrong though.

I saw the first and maybe second episode were in the top 5 tv rankings on netflix. But it's not been on there since. It's a great shame, because I think it's one of the best shows on there. People need to stick with it, but it is complex.
I think I would be in either third, I don't know what job though as I have disabilities. I'm good at practical work (seated) but not hard labour. So otherwise it would be the tail :/
I haven't really thought about least fav, hmm all the people in first, stuck up, obnoxious super toffs.
Till and Jinju I love them :) But I get the feeling Jinju is like spying and getting info for Mel, if that make sense.
Till, Roche, Ruth, Mel so far.
I noticed this too, I think it was a big hint to Mel being Wilford.
I'll have a look later today, I'm in the UK but I thought it kind of dropped out of the charts very quickly
I can't eat bananas, they give me terrible heartburn. but I thought eating green ones weren't good for you, the yellow/brown are the best?
Ahh ok, that's not too bad.
Well done spotting that, must kick myself, I normally spot details like that. It's not the first time it's been upside down.
To be fair probably better holding it that way , considering the gaps either side on those types xDD
Maybe some psychic abilities there then, as it was filmed before the pandemic was even known lol.

I think it happened to fast from when she noticed, and after when she came out she was probably in shock. Plus Nolan was asking questions. Maybe we will see in the next episode her asking people. I'm really worried for Till now, the guards are going to say she went in.
I love Till, I don't think she means to betray Jinju, but she realises something is not right on the train, Till is compassionate and I think is torn between her feelings and duties.

I like Ruth despite her excitement of taking arms. I'm interested to see what way she will go after being shouted at by Melanie, maybe she will side with the Folgers. I also wonder if they will team up with the tail to out Melanie.
I love Boki, I think he is a great character.

WRITING.TITLE: Well-being service can't help me
WRITING.TEXT: 1.5 weeks ago I spoke on the phone for over an hour with a psychologist of our well-being service here. I opened up more than I thought I would. She told me she would email me within 2 weeks. Today I got the email :/ They have discharged me , just like that. There is nothing suitable at the clinic. They gave me contact details for a trust which I've been told is not taking on new clients. So what a waste of time that was!!

I'm kind of used to it, sadly. I will ring the number they gave anyway, but I heard from another clinic they aren't registering new clients at the moment. Otherwise I have pain therapist still ongoing, I guess the mental side of things will just have to use Reddit to post my feelings for now.
ok that didn't work :/ I don't know how to blur the image sorry :/
Sorry, I tried 2 times, and added spoiler tags. I've reread and I can't understand what it means. No worries I just won't create spoiler threads again. :shrugs:

I just spoke to the trust that they gave me the details for. They just started taking on new people. But guess what?! They waiting list to speak to a professional specialist is up to 2 years long! Really couldn't make it up.

WRITING.TITLE: Hii
WRITING.TEXT: I bought my first lot of sneak about a month and a half ago. I saw adverts on Instagram and loved the look of the branding. I suffer from an awful illness called Myalgic Encephalomyelitis (M.E) which is basicly exhaustion/fatigue. I have found that Sneak has been really helpful on my bad days, and I don't suffer the crash like regular energy drinks. I am also a gamer , tho casual :) Looking forward to payday when I can get a tub of the strawberry watermelon :D
Nope, your not :D I really like her, but then I might be abit bias, as I really like Mickey xD

I got the taster sachets to start with. I really like the cherry, blue raspberry (I got that for my first tub), sour apple (and i'm very surprised I could drink it, as sour stuff gives me heartburn), tropikilla and watermelon. I have the white and monochrome shakers. Got my eyes on the blue/pink shaker next.
Ha!! I'm glad i'm not alone there.
It's good, the sour flavour is not to overpowering.
Currently; Final Fantasy 14, Planetside 2, Destiny 2. Recently bought a VR so D #233;racin #233; , Fishermans Tale, I've just bought Ghost Giant so look forward to giving that a go.
You got there once, you can get there again. :)

I noticed this. One reason I came off facebook because I got so fed up with the misery at the start of it. For me there was no difference but I honestly thought my 'friends' would understand a bit of what I go through on a daily basis (I'm not stuck in through choice) people got compassion through each other, but no-one spared a thought for people like me stuck indoors every day through illness. And now those people have gone back to some normality, and i'm still stuck here.
Oh that is amazing, I have tears in my eyes. That's fate. Thank you for saving the fish, nature is amazing. You saved each other.
Might be a good idea. Or might just be practise - use the training area. I refuse to fly in this game because the controls are a nightmare and I have tremors.

also interested, just got a papercut , my SH urges are so bad tonight, the stinging makes me want to grab my blade and make a proper cut. I've tried all my self help ideas (loud music, guided meditations from clinic, calling a friend, distractions, nothing is helping. Next stop is to just go to bed.

WRITING.TITLE: Discharged
WRITING.TEXT: So a few weeks ago I was discharged from the Well Being service here, with an email stating that they can't help me. I then registered with the Sue Lambert Trust but the waiting list is up to 2 years long!! I have just finished a video call with the head of the Pain Psychology department in the Pain Clinic as they have said they have done all the can (mindfulness techniques, retraining brain to deal with pain etc) She suggested I contact the SLT in mean time and ask to see if I can talk to someone if in crisis... Not sure what that actually means because even though I often have thoughts about suicide I would never act on them again. Is harming crisis??I dunno. (I'm 3 months clean today) Also to contact doctor. My doc surgery always want to know the specific nature of the appointment but I don't want to tell them. Pain clinic also said docs will give me meds but I don't want to go on anymore :( Anyway, looks like I'm on my own again for now, unless I can find a psychologist in the next few months, but with lockdown most places have a massive waiting list. So looks like I've just got Reddit for now.
